snippet: Kawhi Leonard scored 29 points and drilled a jumper from the top of the key with 0.9 on the clock to lift the visiting San Antonio Spurs to a 98-96 win over the Orlando Magic on Wednesday night.
abstract: Pro Basketball Roundup; San Antonio Spurs beat Orlando Magic, 98-96; other professional basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kawhi Leonard scored 29 points and drilled a jumper from the top of the key with 0.9 on the clock to lift the visiting San Antonio Spurs to a 98-96 win over the Orlando Magic on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Late Jumper Lifts Spurs Over Magic
headline.main: Late Jumper Lifts Spurs Over Magic
